wikipedia_page.main: Mike Butcher is a UK-based journalist and editor at large for TechCrunch.

response: Butcher served as the pitching coach for the Tampa Bay Rays in 2006, and joined the Angels as their pitching coach in 2007. The Angels announced that Butcher would not be returning as the team pitching coach following the 2015 season. Prior to the 2016 season he was hired by the Arizona Diamondbacks to be their pitching coach.Diamondbacks name Mike Butcher pitching coach

Mike Butcher (journalist), Editor at Large of TechCrunch, noted that "right now I can think of few other people who introduced Lebanon to the international tech community with as much energy, enthusiasm and longevity".
